sentences.sContent: How much are they willing to pay?
...He says there are not enough buyers willing to pay more for the purple tea...
...the more they'll be willing to get into the ring next time...
...I was lucky enough to find a critic and teacher who was willing to make the journey of writing with me...
...they are willing to sacrifice their own time...
...She does not think it's necessary to stay home every day with the children and she knows a very reliable baby-sitter who's willing to come to her house...
...Consumers must be willing to pay for some of these solutions...
...To what extent are Americans really willing to endure the environmental impacts of domestic energy production in order to cut back imports...
...If he has ambitious goals and is willing to put in long hours...
...Do you think he is willing to come to the meeting...
...He often says he is willing to help...

synos.tran: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的

phrases.pCn: 心甘情愿努力干活的人

words.tran: 意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使

trans.tranOther: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it
